content.prompt: Based on the description of the discovery of silver in Zacatecas in the second paragraph, which of the following conclusions about Mota y Escobar is best supported?

choices.label: He had no firsthand knowledge of Mexico.
He was an opponent of the practice of slavery.
He was critical of the motivations of the Spanish conquistadors.
He questioned the economic usefulness of silver mining.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
